# Godspeed (Spell)
## Overview
[[Transmutation Spells|Transmutation]]

**Level:** [[3rd Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 3]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 6th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 6]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, DF

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 63

You call upon divine energy to grant yourself great speed. Your speed becomes 60, regardless of size or encumbrance. Your movements appear to be almost a blur to onlookers. You also gain a +2 haste bonus to Armor Class thanks to this spell.
